House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01484
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING ALL INDEPENDENT POWER PRODUCERS, GENERATION COMPANIES OR ENERGY RESOURCE DEVELOPERS TO REMIT THE AMOUNT THEY ARE REQUIRED TO SET ASIDE AS FINANCIAL BENEFIT DIRECTLY TO THE HOST COMMUNITY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ABAYON, HARLIN NEIL III J.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Espino (037 2016-10-17)2. Nieto (000 2018-02-20)
3. Uybarreta (000 2018-01-31)4. Belmonte (R.) (000 2018-02-05)
5. Dalipe (000 2018-02-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-29
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-05-21
      4. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-05-29
          -The Committee terminated deliberations on the measure, pending submissions by the DOE of: (1) Statement of the remittances to the Bureau of the Treasury of the government shares derived from the power generating plants pursuant to ER 1-94 as well as the manner of its allocation to the host communities; and (2) year-on-year data on the utilization of the fund. Chairman Lord Allan Jay Q. Velasco stated that the Committee will come up with a Committee Resolution urging the DOE to fast track the issuance of the directive for the direct downloading of the host communities of the revenues derived from the power generating plants.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-08-01
